product_name: ANUAHeartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua Heartleaf Quercetinol Pore Deep Cleansing Foam infused with soothing ingredients and BHA that cleanses the skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsWater-based foaming creamCleanses deep within poresFor normal skinFragrance-freeFree Of: Denatured Alcohols / Parabens / Artificial Color / Silicones / Sulfates / Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / Coal Tar DyesKey IngredientsQuercetinol: Extracted from Heartleaf, known for it's soothing properties leaving the skin feeling calm and refreshedANTI-SEBUM P: Helps reduce sebum and minimize the appearance of pores, with 4 plant-derived extracts0.5% BHA: Chemical exfoliants that are a much gentler alternative to physical exfoliants like scrubsResearch ResultsSkin irritation test completedNon-comedogenic test completedAFTER 4 WEEKS:26.709% improvement in oil content17.173% improvement in skin sebum levelsItem 2634189How To UseApply an adequate amount of cleanser.Create enough foam.Gently massage your entire face.Can be used every day, AM & PM.IngredientsHouttuynia Cordata Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Water, Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Coco-Glucoside, Decyl Glucoside, Hectorite, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine Salicylate, Potassium Benzoate, Houttuynia Cordata Powder, Polyquaternium-67, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Dextrin, Disodium EDTA, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Acetate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Quercetin.
how_to_use: Apply an adequate amount of cleanser.Create enough foam.Gently massage your entire face.Can be used every day, AM & PM.

reviews.headline: Amazing Face Wash
reviews.comments: Highly recommend giving this a try. It helped with my acne and keeps my skin soft. Lathers really well with minimal product.

reviews.headline: Amazing cleanser
reviews.comments: Really good product overall, gently exfoliated and cleared up my face really well. Overall recommend.

reviews.headline: Not the best
reviews.comments: I wanted this to work for my pores but it just dried Out my skin and made it peel.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love! -mature skin age 47 approved
reviews.comments: I really love this product. I, i also love their Rice 70 Glow Milky Toner  LOVE feels so good your face . Went back to purchase Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk and Pore Control Cleansing Oil can't wait to use .

reviews.headline: Caused MAJOR breakouts
reviews.comments: After just one night of use, I went from zero pimples on my face (I only get an occasional white head here and there) to innumerable pimples all over both cheek, chin, and forehead. Its taken 10 days of barrier repair and skipping all activires to recover from this insane acne. Ive never experience acne like this in my life. I can't warn you away from this product enough!

reviews.headline: Does as product advertised
reviews.comments: I purchased this cleanser as a last second buy as I wasn't looking too much for a new cleanser but I'm glad I did. Firstly, i only have to use a small amount and lathered it up so when I started to massage my face, you could FEEL it starting to work. I have rare moments of little blisters that form under one or both of my eyes and some were already forming this morning. I remembered I purchased the cleanser yesterday and put it on. I could feel it tingly on my face and especially on the small red blisters. By this afternoon 1pm, the blisters have already minimized and/or gone from my face. The redness is gone and my pores have also minimized. Mind you, this is from ONE wash. I cannot wait to see how this product will work after a week of use. I'm not crazy for the smell but it is not too strong and somewhat decent. Will definitely be using this product again! I also have dry skin and my face feels hydrated and soft stilk from this morning's wash. 10/10 recommend!

reviews.headline: Love results, my nose is so smooth!!
reviews.comments: I tend to be oily and mix skin but this did the job for me!

reviews.headline: Good cleanser
reviews.comments: I have dry sensitive skin. I have tried so many exfoliators but they are all too harsh and not worth hurting my skin to use. I got this cleanser to use not everyday but whenever i need a deeper cleanse/exfoliation. I really like it. I feel like i get a good deep clean without it feeling super harsh. It is definitely a product i cant use everyday. I have a good moisturizing routine and i think that is the only reason i can use this. If i didnt have that it would definitely be too harsh on my sensitive skin. Overall i do like this product and it feels like a good addition to my routine 1-2x a week.

reviews.headline: Best for oily skin and pores!
reviews.comments: I swear i recommend this to everyone i have oily skin that causes the pores on my nose to be clogged. This makes my skin so smooth!!!

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments:
I have oily, acne prone skin so I thought this would be a great cleanser. I really like Anua's rice line and their azelaeic acid serum, but this cleanser was awful! When I first tried it, my skin felt a little tingly when I was foaming it up on my face. I didn't think anything of it sonce some actives do that. But a week after using this cleanser, I started breaking out in painful pimples (mostly white heads but a few cysts) all over my face. I also noticed that the product was separating, so green, oily liquid would come out with it. 
Overall, I dont think this product is suitable for sensitive or acne-prone skin.

reviews.headline: do not use on sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: I currently use trentinoin and everytime I washed my face it burnt so badly, besides that didn't really help with my acne

reviews.headline: auna
reviews.comments: this product has such an amazing formula and is a great second clense after there heartleaf oil Cleanser

reviews.headline: I would buy this again and again
reviews.comments: Product works very well smells great.

reviews.headline: Anua cleasning scrub.
reviews.comments:
I honestly can't express how amazing this product is! I've been struggling with acne for about two years and have tried everything, but nothing worked. My pores were clogged, and my stubborn acne wouldn't go away. However, after using this product for just four days, my face is almost clear. I will definitely be purchasing it again. 

P.S. I recommend double cleansing and gently rubbing your face for about a minute or two for that extra clean feeling.

reviews.headline: Must have!
reviews.comments: Best cleanser I have ever used. Doesn't strip skin or make it dry. This is combination with the rixe enzyme powder changed my skin for the absolute better.

reviews.headline: This stuff sucks
reviews.comments: Bought this bc i had a slight breakout. This has made my skin even worse i have pimples everywhere

reviews.headline: Soft and Smooth
reviews.comments:
I have non-sensitive, non-acne-prone, combination skin. 

After washing my face, my skin feels soft and smooth. My bacne is practically gone! Many reviews are saying this product broke them out but it's working just fine for me. 

FYI: I am not double cleansing, but rather using this product alone.

reviews.headline: Great product for melanated skin
reviews.comments: It is much better at removing my acne and whiteheads than my previous product! I use it morning and night for stellar results but the downside is the price (yikes! I need a sale!) bjt if you gave the money to spare go ahead and grab this product because it does work on melanated skin and it has no skin whitening in it (yay)!

reviews.headline: I finally got my hands on this
reviews.comments: I've been itching to try Korean skincare for the longest and I finally leaped out on faith to try it. I got the pore control cleansing oil for max results and I can't tell any lies this stuff is the TRUTH!!!!! After the first use I saw a difference in my pores and I did still get some new blemishes and this double cleaner set knocks them right out. I even put my sister and her friends on and they've seen differences too

reviews.headline: Gave me hives
reviews.comments: Made my sensitve, dry skin gets red little hives everywhere

media.headline: A little goes a long way!

faceoff_positive.comments:
Here's a refined version of your review:

I love this face wash, though it completely surprised me! I initially expected a liquid formula, but it turned out to have a thick, scrub-like texture instead. It immediately reminded me of the classic Apricot Scrub, a cult favorite.

Because of its thick consistency, I had to work it into my skin to create a lather. To my delight, the process was incredibly relaxing. I'm not sure if this was the brand's intent, but the entire 3-step routine felt like an at-home aesthetician appointment.

I started by oil cleansing with the Anua Heartleaf and gave my skin a few minutes to react before moving to this face wash. When I first dispensed the product, I regretted oil cleansing beforehand, as I realized I'd essentially be double-exfoliating.

To my surprise, the face wash lathered beautifully, just like a traditional foaming cleanser. This also meant that a little went a long way‚Äîjust a pea-sized amount was enough to cleanse my entire face and neck.

I massaged it in for about 60 seconds, following the "60-second rule" to ensure my skin thoroughly absorbed the product without irritation. Since this was my first time trying it, I was cautious, as skin often takes time to adjust to new products.

Overall, the process was a joy. Moving forward, I'd likely use this face wash on its own, skipping the oil cleanser unless I'm wearing makeup. Double cleansing is a must for removing makeup, but doing so unnecessarily can strip your skin of its natural oils.

I'm excited to see the results of consistent use over the next month. I'm hoping for clear, plump, and healthy-looking skin!
faceoff_positive.headline: Fun to Use

faceoff_negative.comments: Even though this cleansing foam leaves you feeling refreshed and also rejuvenated,  I have to state that it is not good for sensitive skin. I looked at the ingredients and decided to give it a shot and had high hopes. However, my acne got so bad that I almost didn't want to leave the house, I was so embarrassed. I have had to use rubbing alcohol,  which seems to be the only thing to control my acne, but I've had to dry my skin out incredibly and basically reverse what this product did just so I could get rid of the acne. However, this is a fun product. I enjoyed making a foam and giving myself a mask. I felt super refreshed by the feel and the smell and calming affect it left before it made me break out. If you enjoy peppermint smells, almost like tea tree, then this is the perfect skincare line for you.
faceoff_negative.headline: Leaves you feeling refreshed
